languages.text: "Яви шрамы, брат! Яви шрамы!" {n}Крик Торбальда подхватывают другие Волки, гулко ударяя кулаками по броне в такт словам. Корабль начинает вибрировать.{/n}
"Show the scars, brother! Show the scars!" {n}Thorbald's cry is echoed by the other Wolves, who bang their fists on their armour in time with the words. The ship begins to vibrate.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Яви шрамы, брат! Яви шрамы!" {n}Крик Торбальда подхватывают другие Волки, гулко ударяя кулаками по броне в такт словам. Корабль начинает вибрировать.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Muestra las cicatrices, hermano! ¡Muestra las cicatrices!». {n}Los otros Lobos se hacen eco del grito de Thorbald, golpeando sus puños contra sus armaduras al ritmo de las palabras. La nave empieza a vibrar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Show the scars, brother! Show the scars!" {n}Thorbald's cry is echoed by the other Wolves, who bang their fists on their armour in time with the words. The ship begins to vibrate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Muestra las cicatrices, hermano! ¡Muestra las cicatrices!». {n}Los otros Lobos se hacen eco del grito de Thorbald, golpeando sus puños contra sus armaduras al ritmo de las palabras. La nave empieza a vibrar.{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “把伤疤亮出来，兄弟！把伤疤亮出来！”{n}索巴德的呐喊得到了其他野狼的响应。他们随着歌声，用拳头敲打着盔甲，飞船随之震动起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Show the scars, brother! Show the scars!" {n}Thorbald's cry is echoed by the other Wolves, who bang their fists on their armour in time with the words. The ship begins to vibrate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “把伤疤亮出来，兄弟！把伤疤亮出来！”{n}索巴德的呐喊得到了其他野狼的响应。他们随着歌声，用拳头敲打着盔甲，飞船随之震动起来。{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「傷を見せるんだ！早く！」{n}トールバルドの怒鳴り声は他のウルフたちを刺激し、その言葉に合わせて拳で鎧を叩きつける。船が振動し始める。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Show the scars, brother! Show the scars!" {n}Thorbald's cry is echoed by the other Wolves, who bang their fists on their armour in time with the words. The ship begins to vibrate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「傷を見せるんだ！早く！」{n}トールバルドの怒鳴り声は他のウルフたちを刺激し、その言葉に合わせて拳で鎧を叩きつける。船が振動し始める。{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Montrez-nous vos cicatrices, mon frère ! Montrez-les-nous ! » {n}Le cri de Thorbald est aussitôt repris par les autres Wolves, qui frappent leurs armures de leurs poings en rythme avec ces mots. Le fracas est tel que le vaisseau se met à vibrer de toutes parts.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Show the scars, brother! Show the scars!" {n}Thorbald's cry is echoed by the other Wolves, who bang their fists on their armour in time with the words. The ship begins to vibrate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Montrez-nous vos cicatrices, mon frère ! Montrez-les-nous ! » {n}Le cri de Thorbald est aussitôt repris par les autres Wolves, qui frappent leurs armures de leurs poings en rythme avec ces mots. Le fracas est tel que le vaisseau se met à vibrer de toutes parts.{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Zeigt die Narben, Bruder! Zeigt die Narben!" {n}Thorbalds Ruf wird von den anderen Wölfen aufgenommen. Sie schlagen sich im Takt mit den Worten mit den Fäusten auf die Rüstung. Das Schiff beginnt zu vibrieren.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Show the scars, brother! Show the scars!" {n}Thorbald's cry is echoed by the other Wolves, who bang their fists on their armour in time with the words. The ship begins to vibrate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Zeigt die Narben, Bruder! Zeigt die Narben!" {n}Thorbalds Ruf wird von den anderen Wölfen aufgenommen. Sie schlagen sich im Takt mit den Worten mit den Fäusten auf die Rüstung. Das Schiff beginnt zu vibrieren.{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Yaralarını göster kardeş! Yaralarını göster!" {n}Thorbald'ın bağırışı, her kelimede yumruklarını zırhlarına vuran diğer Kurtlar tarafından tekrar ediliyor. Gemi titremeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Show the scars, brother! Show the scars!" {n}Thorbald's cry is echoed by the other Wolves, who bang their fists on their armour in time with the words. The ship begins to vibrate.{/n}
